items.headline: ‘I’m stumped’: I put $3,000 on my credit card during a vacation and my credit score plunged. Why is it so volatile?
items.summary_en: “Doesn’t a 30-year history of good credit count for anything?”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I watch antenna TV’: I’m 66. Will I lose my disability benefits if Social Security goes belly up?
items.summary_en: “I read that the Social Security Disability Insurance Trust Fund is good until 2099.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: If New York or California enter a recession, the entire U.S. economy would be next. So how are they doing?
items.summary_en: As two of the biggest states in the country, their economies ”may be canaries in the coal mine,” one economist notes.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: My sister is 65. She has $80,000 in bonds and savings, and $2,600 a month in Social Security. Can she retire?
items.summary_en: “She is single and makes $55,000 a year.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: How can Anthropic stand out in the AI wars? I went to a Greenwich Village pop-up to find out.
items.summary_en: Anthropic’s brand-awareness effort drew thousands as the company competes for consumer attention amid increasing competition.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I can’t stop thinking about money’: I’m struggling with guilt over my $135K in financial mistakes. How do I move on?
items.summary_en: “We aren’t in debt outside of our mortgage, but I feel sick when I think about the money.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Some of the largest exchanges and financial institutions are embracing betting platforms and crypto. Is it just for the fees?
items.summary_en: If legacy financial institutions don’t embrace new technology, their competitors may leave them in the dust.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: My uncle’s widow is threatening to sue me. She wants money from my grandmother’s estate. Should I be worried?
items.summary_en: “My uncle said he had recorded my grandmother saying she would change the will and add him as the beneficiary.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I’d hate to turn her over to the state’: My mother, who has dementia, refuses to be put in a facility. What can we do?
items.summary_en: “She has never been willing to sign a power of attorney.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I have no retirement savings’: My wife and I are in our 40s. She has an $85K Roth IRA. Is it too late for me?
items.summary_en: “Historically, we’ve been keeping the contribution to her Roth at $50-$200 a month.”
